return'damageRange';};// Calculate final stats
const calculateStats=()=>{if(!selectedUnit)return null;const baseStats=selectedUnit.baseStats;const levelMultiplier=1+(level-1)*0.1;// 10% increase per level

let finalStats={};// Apply base calculations with level and upgrade multipliers
Object.keys(baseStats).forEach(stat=>{if(stat==='placement'){// Placement cost is fixed and doesn't change
finalStats[stat]=baseStats[stat];return;}// Use percentage-based multiplier instead of fixed grade multiplier
const percentageBonus=statPercentages[stat]/100;const statMultiplier=1+percentageBonus;let statValue=baseStats[stat]*levelMultiplier*upgradeMultiplier*statMultiplier;// Apply trait effects
if(selectedTrait){const trait=availableTraits.find(t=>t.id===selectedTrait);if(trait&&trait.effects[stat]){statValue*=trait.effects[stat];}}finalStats[stat]=Math.round(statValue);});return finalStats;};// Update calculated stats when any parameter changes
